original_text: As soon as the copy of the letter of King Artaxerxes was read to Rehum and Shimshai the secretary and their associates, they went immediately to the Jews in Jerusalem and compelled them by force to stop.
korean_text: 아닥사스다 왕의 조서 초본이 르훔과 서기관 심새와 그의 동료 앞에서 낭독되매 그들이 예루살렘으로 급히 가서 유다 사람들을 보고 권력으로 억제하여 그 공사를 그치게 하니

sentences.original_text: As soon as the copy of the letter of King Artaxerxes was read
to Rehum and Shimshai the secretary
they went immediately to the Jews in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 즉시 예루살렘에 있는 유대인들에게 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and compelled them by force to stop
